t: Motorcycles equipped with Marzocchi suspension - Motoplanete
s: Marzocchi, founded in Bologna in 1949 by Stefano and Guglielmo Marzocchi, is a historic Italian brand specializing in suspensions for two-wheelers. Initially focused on hydraulics, it became a key player thanks to its innovations and involvement in competition.

March 8, 2025 - Since December 2015 Marzocchi brand was taken over by the Italian company VRM Group together with the historic Zola Pedrosa plant with the birth of the subsidiary Marzocchi Motor and the reinstatement of 70 employees for production. Florenzo Vanzetto become the CEO of the company.
